roulette Python API¶

roulette.model¶

A collection of classes to represent the game of roulette.

Paragraph giving more detail.

Available classes: -Outcome: Represents an outcome of a spin of a wheel in roulette.

class roulette.model.Bet(amount, outcome)¶

Contains an amount bet and the outcome bet upon.

Parameters:
  • amount (Float.) – The amount of money to bet.
  • outcome (Outcome.) – The outcome to bet upon.
lose_amount()¶

Amount player can lose on the bet.

win_amount()¶

Amount player can win on the bet.

class roulette.model.Bin¶

Represents a bin on a roulette wheel. A collection of Outcomes.

add(outcome)¶

Add an outcome to the outcomes.

class roulette.model.Game(table, wheel)¶

Run the game of roulette.

Parameters:table (Table) – The Table you want to play on.
cycle(player)¶

Execute a single cycle of play with a given Player.

exception roulette.model.InvalidBet¶

Raises an exception when there is an invalid bet.

class roulette.model.Outcome(name, odds)¶

Represents an outcome of a spin of a wheel in roulette.

Parameters:
  • name – The name of the outcome, e.g. “Red”, “1”.
  • odds – The odds of the outcome.
win_amount(amount)¶

Calculate the amount of money won.

Parameters:amount (float) – The amount of money bet.
Returns:The amount of money won.
Return type:float
class roulette.model.Simulator(game, player)¶

Collects roulette simulation statistics.

Parameters:
  • game (Game) – An instance of game.
  • player (Player) – An instance of player.
gather()¶

Execute number of game sessions in self.samples.

session()¶

Execute a single game session.

class roulette.model.Table(limit, bets=None)¶

Contains all the bets created by the player.

Parameters:
  • limit (Float) – The maximum permitted total bet on the table.
  • bets (list) – Bets to place on the table.
clear_bets()¶

Clear bets off of the table.

is_valid()¶

Check the bets on the table.

Individual bets must be larger than the table minimum. The total off all bets on the table must not surpass the table limit.

place_bet(bet)¶

Add this bet to the list of working bets.

Parameters:bet (Bet) – A bet to place.
class roulette.model.Wheel¶

Represents a roulette wheel. Contains ‘Bins’.

add_outcome(bin_number, outcome)¶

Add an outcome to the bin with the bin_number index.

get_outcome(name)¶

Return an outcome given it’s common name.

spin()¶

Return a randomly selected Bin.

roulette.player¶

class roulette.player.Martingale(table, stake, base_bet_amount)¶

A player class using the Martingale betting strategy.

The player doubles their bet on every loss and resets their bet to a base amount on each win.

lose(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s lost.

place_bets()¶

Update the table with bets.

playing¶

Returns True while player is still playing.

win(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s won.

class roulette.player.Passenger57(table, stake)¶

A player that only bets on black.

lose(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s lost.

place_bets()¶

Place bet on table.

playing¶

Returns True if player is still playing.

win(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s won.

class roulette.player.Player(table, stake)¶

Abstract base class for players.

lose()¶

Notification of the bet that’s lost.

place_bets()¶

Update the table with bets.

playing¶

Returns True while player is still playing.

win()¶

Notification of the bet that’s won.

class roulette.player.Player1326(table, stake, base_bet_amount)¶
lose(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s lost.

place_bets()¶

Update the table with bets.

playing¶

Returns True while player is still playing.

win(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s won.

class roulette.player.Player1326NoWins(player)¶
current_bet¶

Constructs a new Bet from the player’s preferred Outcome.

next_won()¶

Constructs the new Player1326State instance when bet was a winner.

class roulette.player.Player1326OneWins(player)¶
current_bet¶

Constructs a new Bet from the player’s preferred Outcome.

next_won()¶

Constructs the new Player1326State instance when bet was a winner.

class roulette.player.Player1326State(player)¶

Abstract base class for the player 1326 states.

This is overengineered but demonstrates the state design pattern.

current_bet¶

Constructs a new Bet from the player’s preferred Outcome.

next_lost()¶

Constructs the new Player1326State instance when bet was a loser.

next_won()¶

Constructs the new Player1326State instance when bet was a winner.

class roulette.player.Player1326StateAlternate(player, bet_multiplier, next_win)¶

Alternative player 1326 state class.

This class provides alternative constructors for itself each representing a betting state. The class instances keep track of which instance to instantiate next for the state change. This solution might be overly elaborate.

class roulette.player.Player1326ThreeWins(player)¶
current_bet¶

Constructs a new Bet from the player’s preferred Outcome.

next_won()¶

Constructs the new Player1326State instance when bet was a winner.

class roulette.player.Player1326TwoWins(player)¶
current_bet¶

Constructs a new Bet from the player’s preferred Outcome.

next_won()¶

Constructs the new Player1326State instance when bet was a winner.

lose(bet)¶

class roulette.player.RandomPlayer(table, stake, bet_amount)¶

A player who bets on random outcomes.

lose(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s lost.

place_bets()¶

Update the table with bets.

playing¶

Returns True while player is still playing.

win(bet)¶

Notification of the bet that’s won.

class roulette.player.SevenReds(table, stake, base_bet_amount)¶

SevenReds is a Martingale player who places bets in Roulette.

This player waits until the wheel has spun red seven times in a row before betting black.

place_bets()¶

Update the table with bets.

roulette.player.player_factory(player_name)¶

A player factory

roulette.bin_builder¶

A set of functions used to add bins to the wheel (factory?).

roulette.bin_builder.add_column_bets(wheel)¶

Add column bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_corner_bets(wheel)¶

Add corner bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_dozen_bets(wheel)¶

Add dozen bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_even_money_bets(wheel)¶

Add even-money bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_five_bets(wheel)¶

Add five bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_line_bets(wheel)¶

Add line bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_split_bets(wheel)¶

Add split bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_straight_bets(wheel)¶

Generate straight bet outcomes and add them to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.add_street_bets(wheel)¶

Add street bet outcomes to the wheel.

roulette.bin_builder.create_wheel()¶

Populate the bins in wheel with outcomes.
